name: MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2020
description:
THE MLB baseball game is BACK with MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2020! Get in the game and continue your MLB dynasty!
• 40 MILLION franchise downloads and counting
• Authentic MLB BALLPARKS bring real MLB baseball to your phone
• New TARGET BASH mode – hit the targets and homeruns to earn major rewards
• SIMPLIFIED ROSTER – one roster for ALL game modes, including Slugger modes
• WORLD RANKINGS & Leaderboard MVP – show the world that you’re the best to play the game
• Connect with your TSB19 account with new unified login for huge rewards and to claim your new and improved keepers!

The COMPLETE MLB Experience!
• AUTHENTIC MLB in every way – 2020 MLB Teams, MLBPA Players, and MLB Ballparks
• COLLECT MLB players – From current superstars to the all time greats
• TEAM UP to dominate in Club Events and share the rewards
• CREATE your own player and add him to your team
• NEVER STOP tapping with countless game modes: Slugfest, Home Run Battles, Walk Off Hero, Event Royale, Pick’em, Season Mode, and many more
• ALWAYS FRESH with content and challenges based on the REAL LIVE events of the MLB

Download now to build YOUR MLB dynasty in THE MLB baseball game: MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2020!
